text: Seren Şirince (born March 15, 1991) is a Turkish actress best known for her acting role as "Ayşegül Dinç " in the Show TV's Romantic Comedy television series İlişki Durumu: Karışık opposite Berk Oktay. She achieved a significant outcome in her career. She started at a very young age with the training of Rüçhan Gürel at the Han Theater in Izmir and started to take part in the television series, while her university education was going on. In 2014, she took part in the Lake Shore play at "Talimhane" Theater. Her first film role was a guest appearance in the film Araf Zamanı. She was named Best Comedy Female Actor of the Year at the 2016 Yeditepe University Awards. She also played the role of Nazlı in the Seven Ne Yapmaz series opposite Yusuf Çim, which was broadcast on ATV. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
